#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

char arr[4000000 + 10];
int kmp[4000000 + 10];

int main()
{
	scanf("%s", arr);
	while(strcmp(arr, "End"))
	{
		int k = 0;
		for(int i = 1; arr[i]; ++i)
		{
			while(arr[i] != arr[k] && k)
				k = kmp[k - 1];
			if(arr[i] == arr[k])
				kmp[i] = ++k;
			else
				kmp[i] = k = 0;
		}
		for(int i = 0; arr[i]; ++i)
			printf("%d ", kmp[i]);
		printf("\n");
		scanf("%s", arr);
	}
}
